name: Drifting Mech
description:
Enter Jared, the man in a mech suit. You were dropped off on the intergalactic colony. Now it is your break time, so fly around! Explore! What are you waiting for! Go!

CONTROLS~

WASD/ARROW KEYS: Move

CLICK: Direct body toward mouse pointer

MOUSE POINTER: Aim body when clicking

Enjoy!

-NOTICE-

This is an absolutely stupid game, play at own risk! 

Also, if you are playing on browser, fullscreen is advised in order to see all the game has to offer.
